column3: Great location.  Room size was large.
column4: Very dated, run down and not clean.   After 3 months of being closed, hotel was not ready to open.  Price was very reasonable though.

column3: The breakfasts were great and the location could not have been better. Also the fact it had bike hire with a discount for residents was good as we hired bikes for 2 full days out of our 5 day break. Lovely hotel, lovely holiday!
Right in the centre of town beside the Markt.
Very close to the markt and belfort. You can see the Belfort in your room! If you want to travel Brugge based on the Makrt, this hotel would be great choice for you.
column4: You are supposed to hear ring bell from Belfort. It's not annoying but sometimes.. you may be surprised.

column3: Friendly, helpful staff, great location, just in the center.
Great location and value for money
